text: Andrew Lasker (born November 20, 1982) is an American professional basketball player, and currently plays for the Newcastle Eagles in the British Basketball League. Born in Katy, Texas, he attended Point Loma Nazarene University from 2002 to 2004. He began his basketball career in 2004 with the touring Athletes in Action team, an evangelical Christian sports ministry. In 2005, Lasker turned professional by signing for leading British team Plymouth Raiders and has since played for Newcastle Eagles. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in the United Kingdom Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Basketball players from Texas Category:Surrey Scorchers players Category:Newcastle Eagles players Category:People from Katy, Texas Category:Plymouth Raiders players Category:Point Loma Nazarene Sea Lions men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Harris County, Texas
title: Andrew Lasker
